title: Dont recive LP or Win mark on my Promo
body:
Hey there, i know u are aware of the LP display bug but i wonder if it is only appearance failure or system.
cause i did get into my promo lost a game and got lose mark 1 / 3
then i won 2 games in a row and got no win marks i should have up rank but i got nothing
after each game it showed me 0 win - 0 lose and "Loading circle" where LP should appear
after the first game it happen i thought maybe it is just displaying bug so i kept another one and i won too and same thing happens
0 win - 0 lose and "Loading circle" where LP should be seen.
now i wonder if it is just an display bug why when i entered my "Ranked" category inside my profile i still have 1 lose mark and 0 win marks on my promo
ill upload Images to show you that i didn't receive any win marks and i do have 2 wins and 1 lose in my recent matches.

https://imgur.com/GEVGHrA

https://imgur.com/TBd3KG2

posted here all pictures cause in the "Link" section it does not allow me to upload 2 links

replies.body: AFAIK all of that LP is still being tracked correctly, it just isn't displaying properly on the client for some reason.

I didn't receive any LP for winning today either. Problem is exactly as you described it, loading circle on the champion icon, where mastery and grading are supposed to be, and the upper left corner where it shows the LP you gained. Seeing as you play on EUNE too, it could be a server problem. It has happened before, and in my experience, I did gain my LP later, so expect it to be sorted out soon. If it doesn't get fixed by tomorrow, then the best you can do is file a support ticket on Riot's website.
